name: Super Mario Drugs
description:
Mario revisits the places he once explored to defeat Bowser! But.. something this with this place is, different.

In this game, you play as Mario while revisiting Level 1-1, but instead of just completing the level, you need to avoid obstacles like Goombas, Koopas and Mushrooms!

{Controls}
A|D - Movement
Space - Jump

NOTE: This is game is made for a project and is still in development, I am releasing it to test if it works with Itch.io
